title: Riot this is a solution to fix your buggy leaver buster
body:
Riot,
It has come to my attention that after dcing for literally 20seconds and playing a game for 40minutes gives me a leaver buster. To solve this problem, do what other games do. Let it count down 5 minutes, and after those 5 minutes of dcing you get  a leave even if you come back and reconnect you get a leave unless you redeem yourself by playing X minutes or getting a positive KDA something like that. It is better than your buggy system at the moment. Please don't reply to me saying you were dc for longer than x minutes. I know how to count and I know my maths. The one thing you guys don't know how to do is make a game good. The most massive online moba and still can't even make a leaver system flawless like CSGO and Dota 2. STEP UP YOUR GAME RIOT!

No it doesn't, THey claim it does but nope.

I want them to implement a system WHICH ACTUALLY counts down in THE CHAT saying 1minute until leaver buster... etc.  

they're not replying cause they know im right and their wrong.
They aren't replying because it usually isn't the oceanic team that actually creates these things, they just implement and monitor them.

I have to admit that it is annoying when you leave a match because of something like severe lag, etc, for like 10 seconds and reconnect, you still get either a warning, or the 10 minute low priority queue or even 20 mins, and so on. So yeah Riot, please make it a bit fair for us!
